title: Tabby Professional Development Program
content: At Tabby, we believe in continuous growth for all our feline employees. Full-time employees receive an annual learning budget of 2,000 Salmon Bucks for conferences, courses, and certifications relevant to their role. Additionally, we host monthly 'Sharpen Your Claws' workshops on industry trends and technical skills. Our tuition reimbursement program covers 80% of costs for approved degree programs in Computer Science, Animal Behavior, or related fields. Internal mobility is encouragedâ€”employees can spend up to 10% of their time exploring projects in other departments through our 'Curious Cat' initiative. Annual performance reviews include dedicated career development discussions and goal setting for the upcoming year.
